Dialogue.Page: Can you understand me? Does my translator work towards your native tongue?

DialogueOption.Text: I can hear you just fine!

Dialogue.Page: It's not every day that a stranger like you boards our Vessel.
...especially through the giant hole in our hull.
A collision occurred while en-route. The Vessel teleported directly into an asteroid. I was forced to make an emergency jump.
Luckily this system is known to us. The Bright Spark trio houses a Nomai clan here.
...or so it did. I've been trying to contact any nearby communicators, but nothing has come of it.
Our communications system has not been damaged, and by the lack of noticable activity, I've begun to worry.

DialogueOption.Text: Is there anything I can do?

Dialogue.Page: The lack of activity is frightening.
The Nomai that lived here were known to survive on the largest planet in the system.
We need their help in order to repair my ship. The electrical systems have been heavily damaged, and we don't have enough power to make any subsequent jumps.
As it seems that you holster a functional space-fairing craft, would you be able to offer some assistance?

DialogueOption.Text: Sure. What do I need to do?
I'm not too sure about that...

Dialogue.Page: There's not much I can do without your help.
Could you investigate the nearby astral bodies in search of any Nomai?
...and if you cannot find any Nomai, could you look for any potential large sources of energy?
Report back to me with anything you find.
